entry.title: 结界下的纽伦堡，对焦失败的银河
entry.content:
*Below: Pictures and english version *
图片见文末

中文版

纽伦堡

三点，睁开眼，迷迷糊糊。城市的夜晚总是充盈着亮光。再度入睡，再度醒，赶早上的火车。

车上互换各自的瓜，瓜瓜香甜。

新到的相机镜头，兴奋的拍摄体验；曲折的午餐，回家的豆腐。

美泉的铜环带来新冠，最后的晚餐预示着不幸；厄运扩散，车似蒸炉，结界再展。

银河下的流星

远云而行，赶不上火车；漆黑的上坡，火流星于灯下划过。

草地湿润，万星璀璨，银河朦胧，相机欠佳。

索性躺下，望天，与星光；不期流星，银河已足够广阔温柔。

回家，被火车抛弃。三点，闭上眼。

2023年8月11日有24个小时。

后记

相片失焦，想再试一次。

星空见证了一些故事。

English version

Translated and modified (a lot) by ChatGPT3.5

Nuremberg’s embrace, at three, I rise,
Through sleepy haze, I glimpse the skies.
City night, a dazzling sea of light,
I slip once more in dreams’ tender flight.

Aboard the train, tales exchanged like gold,
Sweet melons shared, stories unfold.
New lens in hand, excitement takes the lead,
Capturing life’s moments, like a swift steed.

Lunch’s winding path, a journey’s end,
Tofu homeward calls, a loyal friend.
A copper band, an omen of change,
Dinner’s farewell, a prelude, strange.

Misfortune’s whisper, a spreading veil,
Steam-wrapped carriages, an eerie tale.
Warding spells, protection’s plea,
‘Neath the Milky Way’s expanse, we plea.

A shooting star, a streak of light,
Through darkened clouds, a fleeting flight.
Up the hill’s abyss, a fiery thread,
In lamplight’s glow, its path is spread.

Dew-kissed meadows, stars in array,
Galactic river, distant astral ballet.
Camera’s attempt, a humble chase,
Yet beneath the sky’s canvas, I find my place.

Homecoming bittersweet, the train’s last call,
At three o’clock, the night’s curtain falls.
August’s eleventh day, a fleeting chance,
Twenty-four hours in life’s intricate dance.

Epilogue

Blurry snapshots, a desire anew,
Constellations witness stories, old and true.
The stars, silent storytellers of every age,
Etching tales in the sky’s endless stage.
